title: The Game On Creating Rocket Fuel In Your Business With Mike “C-Roc” Ciorrocco
itunes:title: The Game On Creating Rocket Fuel In Your Business With Mike “C-Roc” Ciorrocco
description:
Do your bad memories cripple you, or do they push you toward your potential at light speed? And if your answer is the first option, it's time for a reframe...specifically, one that will make you truly unstoppable.
 
Mike "C-Roc" Ciorrocco is the CEO of People Building, Inc. and the visionary brain behind the "What Are You Made Of?" movement as well as a speaker, coach, author and podcast host. He encourages his audience to use their past as fuel to light the fire that ignites their greatness.
 
On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and C-Roc jam on Clubhouse about everything from how C-Roc's background taught him to convert obstacles into rocket fuel to finding motivation to continue leveling up in spite of the events of 2020 to annihilating your goals whether you're just starting out, facing tough times or breaking into a new market - just for a start. Tune in for a history-making podcast recorded directly on Clubhouse with some of the most badass advice you'll hear in your lifetime.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/mike-ciorrocco
 
Get More Involved: 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
